aside:
What is
Lorem Ipsum?

Lorem Ipsum is a commonly used fictional text in the printing and editorial industry to showcase text layout and formatting. This text has no meaning and is composed of Latin words and fragments, which makes it an ideal substitute for real content.

'Lorem ipsum' has roots dating back to the 16th century and is still used as a standard dummy text in graphic design and printing.
